techmeme.title: How Anthropic's Claude became the chatbot of choice for AI industry insiders, who say its responses feel more creative and empathetic and less gratingly robotic (Kevin Roose/New York Times)
Google rolls out NotebookLM Plus, the enterprise version of NotebookLM with added controls for access and data management, as part of Agentspace (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
Google Cloud launches Agentspace to let enterprises create and deploy AI agents for marketing, HR, software development, and more (Larry Dignan/Constellation Research)
Google rolls out interactive Audio Overviews in NotebookLM, an "experimental feature" that lets users talk to the AI "hosts" of the overviews (Jay Peters/The Verge)
OpenAI says the three hour ChatGPT outage on Wednesday was caused by a telemetry service it deployed to collect Kubernetes metrics (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
